commits: 9a84f79 FINALIZER AUDIT: Fix admin dashboard stats, tenant cook display, French translations
d03c2b1 FINALIZER AUDIT: UI polish, placeholder content, and routing bug fixes

check_01_error_pages.notes: 403 page displays correctly. Fixed redirect loop where admin users on tenant domains were incorrectly redirected back to /vault-entry/tenants. 503 inactive-tenant page shows correctly for closed-cook.dmc.test.

check_02_branding.notes: Admin panel shows 'DM Admin' branding. Tenant sites show correct tenant name. Footer shows 'Powered by DancyMeals' with link to main domain.

check_03_navigation.notes: Admin sidebar navigation fully translated and functional. Cook dashboard sidebar shows correct sections. Tenant public nav hides 'About' link when cook has no bio (fixed). Breadcrumbs render on all admin pages.

check_04_theme.notes: Light/dark mode toggle works on all surfaces. Theme persists via localStorage. No visual glitches in dark mode observed.

check_05_locale.notes: EN/FR switching works across admin panel and tenant sites. Fixed 6 missing French translations. All admin sidebar labels, table headers, and stat cards translate correctly.

check_06_responsive.notes: Tested at 375px mobile and 1280px desktop. Cook dashboard collapses to single-column layout correctly. Tenant public landing page renders well at mobile.

check_07_console_errors.notes: Zero console errors on all tested pages.

check_08_data_display.notes: Fixed admin dashboard showing hardcoded stub values. Now queries real DB. Tenant list correctly shows cook names via eager-loaded relationship.

check_09_design_consistency.notes: UI components consistent across admin/cook/public surfaces. Status badges use consistent color tokens.

check_10_placeholder_content.notes: Fixed tenant public landing page rendering Schedule and Delivery Area sections with placeholder text when no data configured.

check_11_conditional_logic.notes: Inactive tenant correctly returns 503. Cook without bio: no About section. Cook without schedule: no Schedule section.

check_12_ui_redundancy.notes: Fixed duplicate theme/language switchers in tenant-public layout footer and cook-dashboard sidebar footer.

check_13_user_journeys.notes: Admin login -> tenant list -> tenant detail: works. Cook login -> dashboard: works. Tenant public browsing: works.

check_14_format_consistency.notes: Dates consistently formatted as 'Feb 23, 2026' across all pages. Currency displayed as '0 XAF' on cook dashboard.

check_15_reactivity_health.notes: Gale search filtering on tenant list works reactively. Language switcher triggers Gale navigate. No SSE errors observed.

bugs_found.description: Admin dashboard stats hardcoded to stub values instead of real DB queries
Tenant list not showing cook names - N+1 query issue and missing display logic
Cook Performance analytics links used integer tenant_id instead of slug, causing 404
403 page redirect loop: admin user on tenant domain redirected to /vault-entry/tenants which requires auth
Tenant public landing page rendered Schedule and Delivery Areas sections with placeholder text when no data
Tenant public nav showed 'About' link even when cook had no bio
Duplicate theme/language switcher controls in tenant-public layout footer and cook-dashboard sidebar footer

polish_improvements.description: Fixed 6 missing French translations in lang/fr.json
Verified all 6 seeded test users had email_verified_at = null; now all verified

arch_observations: [ARCH] Tenant public landing page sections each have independent visibility flags from TenantLandingService. Consider adding a single 'hasContent' computed property to simplify template conditionals.
[ARCH] Admin dashboard stat queries are now inline in DashboardController. As the platform grows, consider extracting to a DashboardStatsService for testability.
[ARCH] Cook Performance analytics query selects tenant slug via selectRaw(). This works but is fragile to refactors. Consider adding a $cook->slug accessor or relationship.
Email verification enforced via banner but cooks can still access /dashboard without verifying. Appears intentional per spec.
